article.title: Tech CEOs boast and bicker about AI at Davos
article.summary: There were times at this week’s meeting of the World Economic Forum when Davos seemed transformed into a high-powered tech conference.

all_candidates.title: Tech CEOs boast and bicker about AI at Davos
all_candidates.summary: There were times at this week’s meeting of the World Economic Forum when Davos seemed transformed into a high-powered tech conference.

all_candidates.title: Former Googlers seek to captivate kids with an AI-powered learning app
all_candidates.summary: Sparkli said that education systems often fall behind in teaching modern concepts. The company wants to teach kids about topics like skills design, financial literacy, and entrepreneurship by creating an AI-powered learning "expedition."

all_candidates.title: A new test for AI labs: Are you even trying to make money?
all_candidates.summary: It’s getting hard to tell which AI labs. are actually trying to make money. We created a rating system to help sort it out.

all_candidates.title: Legal AI giant Harvey acquires Hexus as competition heats up in legal tech
all_candidates.summary: Hexus founder and CEO Sakshi Pratap, who previously held engineering roles at Walmart, Oracle, and Google, tells TechCrunch that her San Francisco-based team has already joined Harvey, while the startup's India-based engineers will come onboard once Harvey establishes a Bangalore office.
